description: Ms. codex. Title from tail of text block (followed by hardly legible words). Physical description: Number of lines per page varies. Written in casual small naskh in black ink with occasional use of red. Marginal annotations by the same hand as the main text. European paper with watermark. Reading statement and ijāzah for al-Shaykh Muḥammad Himmāt al-Shāmī al-Dimashqī, apparently the same as the copyist, dated end of Shawwāl 1133 on fol. 136a. Origin: Text 1 dated 3 Shawwāl 1194(?) [Oct. 1780] (fol. 29a). The other texts were written in Mecca, between Ramaḍān and Dhū al-Ḥijjah 1133 H. [June-Sept.1721] by Muḥammad Himmāt al-Dimashqī (see inscription on fol. 30a and colophons on fol. 44a, 47a, 49a and b, 62a, 106b, 136a). The colophon on fol. 136a gives the following details: copied for himself by Muḥammad Himmāt al-Dimashqī al-Ḥanafī al-Khalwatī al-Akbarī, Mecca, Madrasat Ibn Sulaymān, 11 Shawwāl 1133 [Aug. 5, 1721].
scribe: Himmātʹzādah, Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan, 1680 or 1681-1761 or 1762
abstract: Collection of several short treatises on kalām, logic, etc. The volume consists apparently of two parts, with Text 1 copied in Shawwāl 1194(?) [Oct. 1780] and the other texts written in Mecca, 1133 H. [1721] by Muḥammad Himmāt al-Dimashqī. Table of contents of the second part on fol. 30a.
contents: 1. fol. 2a-29a: Kitāb Wasīlat al-wuṣūl ilá maʻrifat al-ḥaml wa-al-maḥmūl / Aḥmad al-Mawlawī al-shahīr bi-Munajjim Bāsh [Aḥmad ibn Luṭf Allāh Munajjim Bāshī].
2. fol. 30a: [Table of contents].
3. fol. 30b-35a: Risālat al-wujūd / li-baʻḍ al-fuḍalāʼ.
4. fol. 35b: Baḥth fī qawl al-ḥukamāʼ kull mā huwa azalī fa-huwa abadī / Sayyid Aʻẓam al-Hindī.
6. fol. 36a-b: Baḥth fī ibṭāl qidam al-ḥawādith al-yawmīyah / Ibn Kammūnah.
7. fol. 37a-b: Abḥāth fī al-ṣifāt bayn al-falāsifah wa-al-Muʻtazilah wa-al-mutakallimīn / Sayyid Muḥammad Aʻẓam al-Hindī.
8. fol. 38b-44a: Risālah fī taḥqīq al-īmān / [Muḥammad Aʻẓam al-Hindī?].
9. fol. 44b-47a: Risālah laṭīfah fī al-ṭafrah / Sayyid Aʻẓam al-Hindī.
10. fol. 47a-b: Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-Mawāqif fī al-mawqaf al-thānī fī [al-]umūr al-ʻāmmah / Mīrzā Zādah Kābulī.
11. fol. 47b-49a: Risālah fī al-wujūd al-dhihnī wa-al-baḥth bayn al-mutakallim wa-al-ḥakīm.
12. fol. 49a-b: Risālah mulakhkhaṣah min al-Mawāqif fī marātib al-māhīyāt / Ibn Himmāt.
13. fol. 50a-52b: Ḥāshiyah ʻalá al-Jalāl fī al-ʻAqāʼid / Sayyid Aʻẓam al-Hindī.
14. fol. 53b: [Short Fāʼidah on movement, excerpted from the Ḥāshiyah al-muḥaqqiq Munlā Yūsuf Qarābāgh ʻalá Sharḥ al-ʻAqāʼid lil-Jalāl al-Dawwānī].
15. fol. 54a-62a: Risālah Jalāʼ al-qulūb fī uṣūl ʻilm al-taṣawwuf / Muḥammad Aʻẓam al-Pūrabī al-Qinnawjī [al-Hindī].
16. fol. 63a-71b: Mabḥath fī ibṭāl al-juzʼ alladhī lā tajazzá min Rawḍ al-jinān / Abū al-Ḥasan al-Kāshī.
17. fol. 72a: [Gloss on a proposition on metaphysical matters] / Muḥammad Aʻẓam al-Hindī.
18. fol. 72a-73b: Risālat Marātib al-māhiyah / Naṣīr al-Ḥaqq al-Dihlawī al-Hindī.
19. fol. 74a-80a: al-Kashf al-rabbānī fī taḥqīq al-jaʻl / Ṣadr al-Dīn al-Qādirī al-Ḥusaynī al-Sawānawī al-Qinnawjī.

20. fol. 80b: Ḥāshiyah lil-muḥaqqiq Munlā Yūsuf ʻalá Sharḥ al-Jalāl al-Dawwānī fī al-ʻAqāʻid [in table of contents, fol. 30a: "Baḥth min ḥāshiyat Qarabāgh ʻalá al-Jalāl fī al-wujūd"] / Yūsuf Qarabāghī.
21. fol. 81a: Muqaddimah laṭīfah fī aqsām al-ḥaml / [Muḥammad] Aʻẓam.
22. fol. 82a-83a: Risālah / Mirzā Zāhid al-Hindī.
23. fol. 83b-85b: Ḥawāshī ... Muḥammad Aʻznam al-Hindī ʻalá Mīrzā Zāhid ʻalá Munlā Jalāl al-Dawwānī lil-Tahdhīb / Muḥammad Aʻẓam al-Hindī.
24. fol. 86a-b: Risālah fī taḥqīq manḥath al-ʻilm / Muḥammad Aʻẓam al-Hindī.
25. fol. 87a-b: Baḥth fī al-ʻillah.
26. fol. 88a: Risālah fī ittiṣāf al-māhiyah [al-imkānīyah bi-al-wāqiʻīyah].
27. fol. 88b-89a: Taḥqīq anna al-ittiṣāf farʻ taḥaqquq al-mawṣūf / Naṣīr al-Ḥaqq al-Hindī.
28. fol. 89b: [Gloss on a proposition in the previous text] / Muḥammad Aʻẓam al-Hindī.
29. fol. 90a-91a: Risālah fī marātib al-māhīyah / [Muḥammad] Aʻẓam al-Hindī.
30. fol. 91b: [Gloss on the proposition "al-majhūl al-muṭlaq yamtaniʻu ʻalayhi al-ḥukm"] / [Muḥammad] Aʻẓam al-Hindī.
31. fol. 94a: Fāʼidah.
32. fol. 94b-106b: Risālah fī al-waḥdah / [Muḥammad Aʻẓam al-Hindī?].
33. fol. 107a-109a: Baḥth fī ibṭāl qidam al-ʻālam lil-Sayyid Aʻẓam ʻalá al-Qarabāghī / [Muḥammad Aʻẓam al-Hindī].
34. fol. 109b-110a: [Gloss on a proposition relating to propositional logic] / Muḥammad Aʻẓam [al-Hindī].
35. fol. 111a-136a: Kitāb nafīs fī uṣūl al-taṣawwuf / Dāʼūd al-Qayṣarī.
36. fol. 137a-140b: Ḥāshiyat Mīrzā Zāhid ʻalá al-Jalāl / Mirzā Zāhid al-Kābulī.
provenance: Two ownership statements on fol. 1a: one erased, the other in the name of Abū al-Iqbāl Aḥmad Burhān al-Dīn Ibn ʻAsīr al-Islāmbūlī(?) (in violet ink) -- note in Ottoman Turkish by the same hand in the same ink on fol. 141a. Ownership statement in the name of Sayyid ʻIṣmat on fol. 30a.
dlme_provenance_en: Two ownership statements on fol. 1a: one erased, the other in the name of Abū al-Iqbāl Aḥmad Burhān al-Dīn Ibn ʻAsīr al-Islāmbūlī(?) (in violet ink) -- note in Ottoman Turkish by the same hand in the same ink on fol. 141a. Ownership statement in the name of Sayyid ʻIṣmat on fol. 30a.
subject: Manuscripts, Arabic—New Jersey—Princeton
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
